mapper.sql: GENE_ID, CASE_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, BOARD_NO, PANEL_ID, PANEL_NAME,GENE_TYPE, GENE_INFO, IMAGE_PATH, BOARD_POSITION, AUDIT_STATUS, AUDITOR, AUDIT_DATETIME, AUDITED_GENE_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, REVIEW_STATUS,LAB_ANALYSIS_INFO_ID,PANEL_NAME,IS_MIX
mapper.select:
select lsg.*, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as SAMPLE_NO, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as SAMPLE_NAME, di_1.DICT_NAME as SAMPLE_TYPE_NAME, lsid.RELATION_SAMPLE_NO as RELATION_SAMPLE_NO, lsid.IS_RELATION as IS_RELATION, lsid.SAMPLE_SOURCE as SAMPLE_SOURCE from LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE lsg left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lsg.SAMPLE_ID left join dict_item di_1 on di_1.dict_code = lsid.SAMPLE_TYPE and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='SAMPLE_TYPE'
ORDER BY lsid.SAMPLE_NO,NLSSORT(lsg.board_position,'NLS_SORT = SCHINESE_PINYIN_M'), lsg.create_datetime ASC

select lsg.*, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as SAMPLE_NO, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as SAMPLE_NAME, di_1.DICT_NAME as SAMPLE_TYPE_NAME from LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE lsg left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lsg.SAMPLE_ID left join dict_item di_1 on di_1.dict_code = lsid.SAMPLE_TYPE and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='SAMPLE_TYPE' where lsg.LAB_ANALYSIS_INFO_ID = #{labAnalysisInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsg.delete_flag = '0'
select lsg.* from LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE lsg where lsg.case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsg.delete_flag = '0' and lsg.audit_status='1'
mapper.insert: insert into LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE (GENE_ID, CASE_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, BOARD_NO, PANEL_ID, PANEL_NAME, GENE_TYPE, GENE_INFO, IMAGE_PATH, BOARD_POSITION, AUDIT_STATUS, AUDITOR, AUDIT_DATETIME, AUDITED_GENE_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, REVIEW_STATUS,LAB_ANALYSIS_INFO_ID,IS_MIX ) values (#{geneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{panelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{panelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geneInfo,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditedGeneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{labAnalysisInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMix,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSIGNMENT_ID = #{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_ID = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOARD_NO = #{boardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PANEL_ID = #{panelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PANEL_NAME = #{panelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENE_TYPE = #{geneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENE_INFO = #{geneInfo,jdbcType=CLOB}, IMAGE_PATH = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOARD_POSITION = #{boardPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_DATETIME = #{auditDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDITED_GENE_ID = #{auditedGeneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_DATETIME = #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_PERSON = #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_STATUS = #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_ANALYSIS_INFO_ID = #{labAnalysisInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MIX = #{isMix,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GENE_ID = #{geneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE set AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_DATETIME = #{auditDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GENE_ID = #{geneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select lsg.* from LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE lsg where lsg.sample_id = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsg.delete_flag = '0' and lsg.AUDIT_STATUS = '1'
select lsg.* from LIMS_SAMPLE_GENE lsg where lsg.sample_id = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsg.delete_flag = '0'
